item.title: Der kleine Hey
item.description: I had a dental operation and have problems articulating. I recalled learning with “Der kleine Hey”. I couldn’t locate it in my library. I was positively surprised it’s in the public domain by now. The 1884 edition is on archive.org: Hey It’s well worth checking out if you want to work on your (German) pronunciation. Now - let’s see how soon I can talk again.
